name: Jeopardy! Platinum Edition
overview: Everybody loves JEOPARDY!, America's favorite answer and question game. GameTek has crammed over 1,500 new answers and questions into this game pak, taken directly from the archives of the show. Compete against a friend, match wits with the computer, or test your memory alone for fun. It's every bit like the fast-paced TV show: Daily Doubles, Final JEOPARDY! and the actual theme music to make you feel like you're really there!
